entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
